website_summaries.verdict: The Bowers & Wilkins PX5 headphones offer highly effective, relatively affordable on-ear noise cancellation and quality audio performance.
pros: Rich bass depth balanced with bright highs
cons: Sculpted sound signature not for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Very hood headphones, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Those are extremly good headphoses, and i would keep them over px7, but once on my head they pressing continualisly top of my head! Cannot stand it. I would describe my head as roung mid sice. Sound quality very good, on some songs more expensive px7 sounds a bit better, Noise cancelation i found slightly better than on px7, which is strange, as px7 ane over ear, and much more expensive. Honestly, like them better than px7 and will stick with them, but not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Zenon Swatek

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful headphones with great sound to boot.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement for my Beoplay H8 headphones and really could not be happier. They look and sound fantastic, producing a clear and precise sound. The app has a great minimalistic interface and the headphones are a breeze to connect to my iPhone. I would thoroughly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: sound great
customer_reviews.text: These sit tightly to my small head and sound great. On the London tube the noise cancelling allows me to listen to grown up music. The controls are very discreet and I had to download a manual my old eyes could read. Now I've learned the controls they are easy to use and commendably versatile, clever stuff! The build is solid and elegant. Good old Bowers and Wilkins, you get what you pay for and they ain't cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. M. C. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: All good with these excellent headphones. Bowers & Wilkins headphones are superb. Once you put them and and adjust properly they are very comfortable. Noise cancelling excellent. They are more compact than the PX7's which are even better but more expensive. The P14 in ear are excellent too. I find it hard to get in ear's that stay in these do. Sound is excellent and very very compact. You really cannot go wrong with Bowers & Wilkins
customer_reviews.author: P Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones. Great sound and elegant design. Comfortable to wear. ANC doesn’t have any noticeable impact on sound quality. What’s good is that there are 3 levels of ANC, high, low and auto. High was good enough to allow you to enjoy music in a noisy underground train. Low is useful in a quiet commuter train and you can still hear the announcement. The only criticism is that the arms could have been allowed to extend a bit more to suit people with larger heads/lower ears.
customer_reviews.author: Yiping Ge

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality, superb sound, very comfortable, decent noise cancellation, solid Bluetooth connection and good value. Edit after 4 months of very light use. The leather on the headband started to untuck at the end. This was very disappointing and has caused me to reduce by one star. The headphones were kept in the supplied case and were never worn out and about or carried in a bag, ever. Luckily Amazon have replaced them for me. Maybe just unlucky with a slight fault on a pair. Will update with a review of the replacements. 5* service from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Are they brand new or even the real thing I wonder?
customer_reviews.text: Purchased what I assumed to be a new pair of B&W PX5s.... immediate problems with drop out and getting music to play again after taken off the ear but the strangest thing that in connecting through the B&W app it identifies a 2015 Mac belonging to someone else.. are these new? As a result I contacted the manufacturer who has no record of the serial number in question. I can only conclude this are fake headphones and maybe Amazon as the seller would care to comment..
customer_reviews.author: Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones but 3 have failed with the same issue now within a year!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones - the build quality FEELS great, the sound is the best I've experienced and they're super comfy. However, I've had the same issue 3 times and I'm now on my 3rd replaced pair and within 3 months of getting the last ones they have broken on me again. The right headphone has stopped working! I'm immensely disappointed now and will be seeking a refund! This is unacceptable and it's not the suppliers fault - B&W have made a product with a fatal flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous headphones, great sound, although the noise cancellation could be better.
customer_reviews.text: All the great sound you would expect from Bowers and Wilkins. Very comfortable and like to wear as well. The noise cancellation isn’t the best, I have seen better on other headphones, but the sound quality more than makes up for this.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The anc is sub par. They are uncomfortable and can't be worn on long hauls. Connects easily and great sound quality. Shame one side stopped working after a month. Waste of good money.
customer_reviews.author: Arjun

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Product worked well but now one side of the headphones is not working. No obvious trauma but now I can’t turn my head without the right side cutting out. Total waste of money as they only lasted 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I can't give you an opinion as they were a presenr for my son. He told me they were excellent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily damaged headset
customer_reviews.text: First of all when I got these there was a real feeling of luxury about the set and the headphones themselves were excellent - sound was the best I'd ever had in a pair with really effective noise cancellation. However and it's a massive however, 2 pairs lost sound in the left earcup within 2 weeks of having them, They were carefully looked after and weren't overused. Really disappointing product from a company with such an auspicious reputation. 2 stars for the sound and noise cancelling but I cannot recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Part-time cyclist

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Headphones came on time, but one side(right) did not worked, Quality control not really did the job for such high branded model
customer_reviews.author: Alex Nikolajevas

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a christmas Present for my Husband
customer_reviews.text: they look ok. he has requeted these as the a similar to some of his hifi equipemnt which he is very pleased
customer_reviews.author: annb

customer_reviews.title: Tinny and no bass at all
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price up sound is very tinny with no bass, I ended up getting a full refund and buy a replacement skullcandy evo which are 100x better and £100 cheaper. Don't waste your money on these bowers
customer_reviews.author: jonathan bolton

customer_reviews.title: The best bar none
customer_reviews.text: It takes a few minutes to discover the richness and depth of sound you probably didn't know you were missing. In those few minutes, you'll get used to the headphones making themselves comfortable on you. Just superb and a very reasonable price for a lovely looking piece of high-end kit.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Got these ones wrong B&W
customer_reviews.text: Should of got the over ear jobbies. These are totally overpriced. ANC isn’t up to scratch and they’re not very comfortable. On the plus side B&W always deliver nice sound, but it loses quality once you use ANC which defeats the object of having noise cancelling headphones, doesn’t it? One star for sound but everything else is negative I’m afraid.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Worthington

product_meta.title: Bowers & Wilkins PX5 Wireless On Ear Headphones with Active Noise Cancellation - Space Grey
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Space GreyPX5 On Ear Noise Cancelling Headphones.

The PX5 are designed with sound taking priority. The bass goes deep, the soundstage is wide, the details are astounding for all genres of music. As is standard with all PX headphones these include Qualcomm’s aptX HD Bluetooth – a high-quality codec that enables the wireless transmission of 24-bit hi-res audio.

Thanks to the carbon fiber composite material used for the arms and the soft ear cushions for naturally to the ear without discomfort or pressure, the PX5 are our most comfortable & ergonomic headphones to date

Controls are designed for ease of use, with dedicated buttons for noise cancellation, play/pause/volume, and power/Bluetooth. If preferred, you can rely on the sensors which automatically play/pause playback when you put them on and remove them. 

There's also a headphone jack and USB-C connector, allowing for a wired connection to any phone /tablet device. 

The PX5 come with a dedicated mobile app available on the Google play store & IOS app store ‘ Bowers & Wilkins Headphones’, which lets you check battery status, fine-tune the noise cancellation settings, listen to soundscapes offline, manage connections for up to 6 devices and update the software with new features added regularly

NEW FOR 2020 Soundscapes: 

Block outside noise from planes, trains, etc. with no internet available
Meditation or relaxation/yoga function
Working without playing actual music. 

Offline Playback: Soundscape playback can be done on/offline. 

•Like Being There: High quality binaural recordings were used to capture the sounds. 

•Continuous Looping: Continuous loop with almost no detection of when the audio clip resets . 

•Various Environments: Currently there are six environments to choose from. 

•Countdown Timer: Set the timer in the top right to help tell you when it’s time to get back to work.
feature_bullets: THE PX5 IS LIGHT & PORTABLE wireless headphone that delivers sound quality built on Bowers & Wilkins’ exacting standards These on ear headphones are custom-designed 35mm drivers designed and tuned by the same team behind our 800 Diamond series speakers used in Abbey Road studios
ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLATION automatically adjusts to keep impurities out of the sound offering a premium noise isolating experience

B&W BLUETOOTH HEADPHONES Play 25 hours at a time one battery charge and just over a full day of music If for some reason you need more power a 15-minute quick Charge provides five hours of audio playback
FOLLOWS YOUR LEAD the PX5 obeys your every move Lift an ear cup to hear what’s happening around you and the music automatically stops Put it back and the music plays on

INSPIRED BY SUPER CARS the woven carbon fibre composite arms of the PX5 mimics the strength and agility of the fastest vehicles in the world channeling pure sound to you and holding up against everyday wear and tear These headphones rest easy in your work or overnight bag so you can driver into sound anywhere

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
